alert.note: Alert for Coastal Chatham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 5:38PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...DENSE SEA FOG ALONG THE BEACHES AND NEARBY WATERWAYS... Areas of dense sea fog will linger along the beaches and nearby waterways this evening. The fog could move inland through the overnight hours, mainly along rivers, creeks, harbors and sounds, including the Intracoastal Waterway. Some waterways which may be impacted include the Savannah Harbor, Charleston Harbor as well as the Stono, Ashley, Wando, Copper, Broad, and Edisto. Visibilities in the fog could drop to 1/4 mile or less at times.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down and leave extra distance ahead of you in case a sudden stop is needed.
